sentences.en: ' stopped to talk with Huckleberry Finn. "
sentences.cn: “路上和哈克贝利-费恩讲话耽搁了. ”

sentences.en: " Huckleberry Finn , indeed! It ain't a name to open many doors, I judge!
sentences.cn: “ 确实是哈克贝利-费恩,不过,冲 你 这名字,不会有很多人家愿意开门.

sentences.en: " Huckleberry, what do you reckon'll come of this? "
sentences.cn: “ 哈克贝利, 你想这事结果会 怎么样 ? ”

sentences.en: " I reckon so,'said Huckleberry; anyways, I'm suited.
sentences.cn: “ 我猜是这样, ”哈克贝利说, “不管怎样讲, 我挺喜欢这儿.

sentences.en: " Tom, " whispered Huckleberry, " does this keep us from ever telling -- always? "
sentences.cn: “ 汤姆, ” 哈克贝利小声问道, “ 这样一来, 我们将不会泄密, 永远都不会,是 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: " Well, all right,'said Huckleberry, " it's a trade. "
sentences.cn: “ 哼, 那好吧. ” 哈克贝利说, “换就换吧. ”

sentences.en: "'Tain't thunder,'said Huckleberry, in an awed tone, " becuz thunder -- "
sentences.cn: “ 那不是雷声, ”哈克贝利说, 声音里带有惊恐, “ 因为雷声 —— ”

sentences.en: Groves of stunted red spruce, huckleberry, blueberry, mountain laurel, mountain holly, speckled alder, and cranberry bogs, show combinations of colors throughout the year.
sentences.cn: 发育不良云杉的小树林、黑果木、蓝莓、山月桂、山冬青，斑点桤木和种越橘的沼泽地，显示着全年各种颜色的组合。

sentences.en: He turned, and his eyes met Huckleberry's.
sentences.cn: 他转过身来发现是哈克贝利.

sentences.en: Huckleberry came and went, at his own free will.
sentences.cn: 哈克贝利来去很自由, 全凭自己高兴.

sentences.en: Huckleberry Finn was there, with his dead cat.
sentences.cn: 哈克贝利-费恩早已等候在那里, 手里还拿着他那只死猫.

sentences.en: Huckleberry was filled with admiration of Tom's facility in writing, and the sublimity of his language.
sentences.cn: 对汤姆流利的书写 、 响亮的内容,哈克贝利心悦诚服.

sentences.en: I have read The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn this week.
sentences.cn: 我本周读了哈克贝利芬历险记.---我本周开始读而且已经读完了.

sentences.en: I have watered the red huckleberry, the sand cherry and the nettle-tree, the red pine and the black ash, the white grape and the yellow violet, which might have withered else in dry seasons.
sentences.cn: 我还浇灌红色的越橘树、沙色的樱桃树和荨麻树、红色的松树和黑色的白蜡树，还有白色的葡萄树和枯黄的紫罗兰，不然它们会在干旱的季节里枯萎的。

sentences.en: Like " Huckleberry Finn " , " The Catcher in the Rye " is a coming - of - age novel.
sentences.cn: 《麦田守望者》跟《哈克贝利·费恩历险记 》 一样,都是成长纪事小说.

sentences.en: Our class discussed Huckleberry Finn, a book written by Mark Twain.
sentences.cn: 我们班讨论了哈克贝利.芬, 马克·吐温写的一本书.

sentences.en: Somebody pinched his arm. He turned, and his eyes met Huckleberry's.
sentences.cn: 这时有人在他胳膊上拧了一下, 他转过身来发现是哈克贝利.

trans.tran_en: any American ericaceous shrub of the genus Gaylussacia, having edible dark blue berries with large seeds
